typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		A as string,
		B as string,
		C as string,
		D as string,
		E as string,
		F as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BlobContainer
BlobContainer alterRow(upsertIf(procs_id==procs_id)) ~> UpdateOrInsert
UpdateOrInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		A as string,
		B as string,
		C as string,
		D as string,
		E as string,
		F as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['A'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AzureSQLDB
